pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā kosambiyaṃ viharati ghositārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā channo anācāraṃ ācaritvā saṅghamajjhe āpattiyā anuyuñjīyamāno aññenaññaṃ paṭicarati—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:1.3: “ko āpanno, kiṃ āpanno, kismiṃ āpanno, kathaṃ āpanno, kaṃ bhaṇatha, kiṃ bhaṇathā”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:1.4: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:1.5: “kathañhi nāma āyasmā channo saṅghamajjhe āpattiyā anuyuñjīyamāno aññenaññaṃ paṭicarissati—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:1.6: ‘ko āpanno, kiṃ āpanno, kismiṃ āpanno, kathaṃ āpanno, kaṃ bhaṇatha, kiṃ bhaṇathā’”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:1.7: saccaṃ kira tvaṃ, channa, saṅghamajjhe āpattiyā anuyuñjīyamāno aññenaññaṃ paṭicarasi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:1.8: ‘ko āpanno, kiṃ āpanno, kismiṃ āpanno, kathaṃ āpanno, kaṃ bhaṇatha, kiṃ bhaṇathā’”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:1.11: kathañhi nāma tvaṃ, moghapurisa, saṅghamajjhe āpattiyā anuyuñjīyamāno aññenaññaṃ paṭicarissasi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:1.12: “ko āpanno, kiṃ āpanno, kismiṃ āpanno, kathaṃ āpanno, kaṃ bhaṇatha, kiṃ bhaṇathā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:1.16: “tena hi, bhikkhave, saṅgho channassa bhikkhuno aññavādakaṃ ropetu.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:1.20: Ayaṃ channo bhikkhu saṅghamajjhe āpattiyā anuyuñjīyamāno aññenaññaṃ paṭicarati.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:1.21: Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, saṅgho channassa bhikkhuno aññavādakaṃ ropeyya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:1.24: Ayaṃ channo bhikkhu saṅghamajjhe āpattiyā anuyuñjīyamāno aññenaññaṃ paṭicarati.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:1.26: Yassāyasmato khamati channassa bhikkhuno aññavādakassa ropanā, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:1.29: Khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī’”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:1.30: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṃ channaṃ anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā dubbharatāya …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:1.31: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:1.33: Evañcidaṃ bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:2.1: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā channo saṅghamajjhe āpattiyā anuyuñjīyamāno aññenaññaṃ paṭicaranto—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:2.3: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:2.4: “kathañhi nāma āyasmā channo saṅghamajjhe āpattiyā anuyuñjīyamāno tuṇhībhūto saṅghaṃ vihesessatī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:2.5: “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ, channa, saṅghamajjhe āpattiyā anuyuñjīyamāno tuṇhībhūto saṅghaṃ vihesesī”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:2.8: kathañhi nāma tvaṃ, moghapurisa, saṅghamajjhe āpattiyā anuyuñjīyamāno tuṇhībhūto saṅghaṃ vihesessasi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:2.12: “tena hi, bhikkhave, saṅgho channassa bhikkhuno vihesakaṃ ropetu.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:2.16: Ayaṃ channo bhikkhu saṅghamajjhe āpattiyā anuyuñjīyamāno tuṇhībhūto saṅghaṃ viheseti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:2.17: Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, saṅgho channassa bhikkhuno vihesakaṃ ropeyya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:2.20: Ayaṃ channo bhikkhu saṅghamajjhe āpattiyā anuyuñjīyamāno tuṇhībhūto saṅghaṃ viheseti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:2.22: Yassāyasmato khamati channassa bhikkhuno vihesakassa ropanā, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:2.25: Khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī’”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:2.26: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṃ channaṃ anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā dubbharatāya …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:2.27: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:3.1.2: saṅghamajjhe vatthusmiṃ vā āpattiyā vā anuyuñjīyamāno taṃ na kathetukāmo taṃ na ugghāṭetukāmo aññenaññaṃ paṭicarati— “ko āpanno, kiṃ āpanno, kismiṃ āpanno, kathaṃ āpanno, kaṃ bhaṇatha, kiṃ bhaṇathā”ti. Eso aññavādako nāma.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:3.1.4: saṅghamajjhe vatthusmiṃ vā āpattiyā vā anuyuñjīyamāno taṃ na kathetukāmo taṃ na ugghāṭetukāmo tuṇhībhūto saṅghaṃ viheseti. Eso vihesako nāma.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:3.1.5.1: Aropite aññavādake saṅghamajjhe vatthusmiṃ vā āpattiyā vā anuyuñjīyamāno taṃ na kathetukāmo taṃ na ugghāṭetukāmo aññenaññaṃ paṭicarati—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:3.1.6: “ko āpanno, kiṃ āpanno, kismiṃ āpanno, kathaṃ āpanno, kaṃ bhaṇatha, kiṃ bhaṇathā”ti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:3.1.7: Aropite vihesake saṅghamajjhe vatthusmiṃ vā āpattiyā vā anuyuñjīyamāno taṃ na kathetukāmo taṃ na ugghāṭetukāmo tuṇhībhūto saṅghaṃ viheseti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:3.1.8: Ropite aññavādake saṅghamajjhe vatthusmiṃ vā āpattiyā vā anuyuñjīyamāno taṃ na kathetukāmo taṃ na ugghāṭetukāmo aññenaññaṃ paṭicarati—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:3.1.9: “ko āpanno, kiṃ āpanno, kismiṃ āpanno, kathaṃ āpanno, kaṃ bhaṇatha, kiṃ bhaṇathā”ti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:3.1.10: Ropite vihesake saṅghamajjhe vatthusmiṃ vā āpattiyā vā anuyuñjīyamāno taṃ na kathetukāmo taṃ na ugghāṭetukāmo tuṇhībhūto saṅghaṃ viheseti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:3.2.1: Dhammakamme dhammakammasaññī aññavādake vihesake, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:3.2.2: Dhammakamme vematiko aññavādake vihesake, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:3.2.3: Dhammakamme adhammakammasaññī aññavādake vihesake, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:3.3.4: “saṅghassa bhaṇḍanaṃ vā kalaho vā viggaho vā vivādo vā bhavissatī”ti na katheti;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:3.3.5: “saṅghabhedo vā saṅgharāji vā bhavissatī”ti na katheti;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:3.3.6: “adhammena vā vaggena vā nakammārahassa vā kammaṃ karissatī”ti na katheti;
